name: Armadillo Run

files.setup: N/A:Please select the installer for Armadillo Run

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Please select the installer for Armadillo Run
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Armadillo Run/Armadillo Run.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Armadillo Run
    executable: setup
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
